HUDElement

public HUDElement(java.awt.Image i)
class constructor to create a HUDElement with values and Image from the specified Image

Parameters:
i - Image to be used to create the HUDElement

HUDElement

public HUDElement(java.awt.Image i,
                  java.awt.Image secondaryImage,
                  int imageType)
class constructor to create a HUDElement with values and two Images The second Image uses the specified int to decide which Image it is.

Parameters:
i - Image to be used for values and as the normalImage
secondaryImage - Image to be used for another Image
imageType - int to specify whether the secondaryImage is a clickImage or a rolloverImage
See Also:
CLICK_IMAGE, ROLLOVER_IMAGE

HUDElement

public HUDElement(java.awt.Image i,
                  java.awt.Image rImage,
                  java.awt.Image cImage)
class constructor to create a HUDElement with values and all three Images

Parameters:
i - Image to be used for values and as the normalImage
rImage - Image to be used for the rolloverImage
cImage - Image to be used for the clickImage
